title: AN ACT relating to marriage and family therapists.
subject: Boards and Commissions
Health and Medical Services
Licensing
Mental Health
Occupations and Professions
Workforce

abstracts.abstract: Amend KRS 335.330 to require the board to review and approve applications within the specified time frames and to issue licenses within two weeks of application completion date; amend KRS 335.332 to allow an approved acting supervisor to assume responsibility for an associate practitioner receiving qualifying experience; amend KRS 335.340 to require the board to issue renewal license within two weeks of request receipt; create a new section of KRS 335.300 to 335.399 to mandate reciprocal licensure of a practitioner licensed in another state when specified criteria are met.
